BackstoryDef.title: house servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a low-level servant in a royal house. \n[PAWN_pronoun] cleaned rooms and moved items as directed by the senior staff, while attempting to remain invisible to the lords and ladies of the house.

BackstoryDef.title: head butler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the head servant in a royal house. \n[PAWN_pronoun] managed the other servants to ensure the lord's will was done, even before the lord knew what it was.

BackstoryDef.title: royal masseuse
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a massage artist for an extended royal house. [PAWN_pronoun] serviced many members of the royal family, and their guests. \n[PAWN_nameDef] occasionally offered something extra, if the lord or lady was in the mood. Advancing in this line of work meant having refined social skills.

BackstoryDef.title: menagerie keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed the royal menagerie of a powerful family at their estate. \n[PAWN_nameDef]'s job saw [PAWN_pronoun] feeding elephants, tranquilizing lions, and training birds to display their plumage to titled visitors.

BackstoryDef.title: ballet dancer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dancer in a traditional ballet troupe. [PAWN_pronoun] mastered the ancient motions and entertained thousands.

BackstoryDef.title: ornament maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted watches, medals, machined jewelry and other complex curios for royal patrons.

BackstoryDef.title: royal cook
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made meals for [PAWN_possessive] aristocratic patrons. \nOnly the finest food was acceptable, so [PAWN_nameDef] tended a small garden on the mansion grounds to get the freshest herbs and vegetables. [PAWN_pronoun] fell in love with the food [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: imperial priest
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a priest in the imperial church. \n[PAWN_pronoun] spent half [PAWN_possessive] time studying books to understand the relationship between God's aspects and the facets of [PAWN_possessive] society. The other half was spent preaching the evils of sloth and drink.

BackstoryDef.title: imperial inquisitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an inquisitor in the imperial church's anti-heresy school. \n[PAWN_nameDef] hunted unorthodox thoughts wherever they could be found - art, music, code, even private conversations. Upon finding deviance, [PAWN_pronoun] exposed it to bring on the punishment of the collective. And [PAWN_pronoun] could always find the deviance if [PAWN_pronoun] looked hard enough.

BackstoryDef.title: church psychic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a psychic in the imperial church's psychic school. \n[PAWN_nameDef] trained [PAWN_possessive] mind to sense the collective emotions and impressions of the people. It was a way to touch the spirit of the empire. It was also a way to root out heretical trends in thought.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a very large office complex along with thousands of other suited drones. \nThe work itself consisted of endless organizational drudgery and pointless meetings, punctuated by the occasional performance review.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate manager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massive open-plan office, ensuring that [PAWN_possessive] assigned team of workers stayed mostly on-task. \nThe job was intensely political. In order to advance, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to arrange things so [PAWN_pronoun] could take credit for work done by almost anyone.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate fixer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fixer for an energy corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work required knowing when to push, when to pull, when to back down and when to strike. The job fit [PAWN_possessive] natural lack of empathy. \nWhile violence was unusual, [PAWN_nameDef] stayed prepared for anything.

BackstoryDef.title: planetary miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mining engineer for a major planetary mining corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work kept [PAWN_objective] underground for weeks at a time, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew to appreciate the darkness.

BackstoryDef.title: mailman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carried mail on [PAWN_possessive] assigned routes. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] was even sent to deliver special packages to stylish corporate offices or mansions. \n[PAWN_nameDef] got pretty good at avoiding and fighting off angry dogs.

BackstoryDef.title: assembler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on factory assembly lines, putting together products with the help of robots.

BackstoryDef.title: builder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on construction sites, building everyday structures according to [PAWN_possessive] boss' instructions.

BackstoryDef.title: crop farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a crop farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed soil, agricultural equipment, weather patterns, and price trends to optimize the planting and harvesting of massive crop fields.

BackstoryDef.title: livestock farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a livestock farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed animal genetics, feed types, birth and slaughter methods, and price trends to optimize the raising of huge animal herds.
